item.title: CVE-2024-43116|2024-08-26T20:52:51.206Z -- 10up -- simple%20local%20avatars
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 10up Simple Local Avatars.This issue affects Simple Local Avatars: from n/a through 2.7.10.
